eheth pasugiya 9da sita mema yathrawa sambandhayen kisidu thorathurak nolabuna athara 12da niyamitha ayurin migamuwata sendu nowu bawatath amathyanshayata wartha kara thibuni.me athurudahan wu yathrawa soya wenath yathra dekak da ikuth 19da diyambaata gos thibuni.eheth eeye (22da) migamuwe sita muhudu sathapum 100ka pamana durin karmika doshayak nisa muhudehi pawemin thibu sanduni walantina 3 yathrawa wenath yathrawakata hamu wi athi athara ema doshaya iwath karagena perala diwayinata sendu wimata gamanarambha kala bawath dhiwara amathyanshaye adhyakshawarayeku wana lal da silwa mahatha kiya.kese wethath me yathrawe siti pirisa nirogi suwen sitina athara owun ada (23da) sawas wanawita migamuwata langawiya haki bawath ee mahatha kiya..
